snippet.title: Ruggnar - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1303050

Play as Ruggnar, a dwarf who left his home city to find fortune.
Unfortunately, the dungeons, although abandoned, are full of traps and puzzles.
Axes, spikes, arrows, and even water! Nothing will be spared for our poor Ruggnar!
Dive into the fun-filled world of Ruggnar!

More news about the game on social media:
https://twitter.com/ruggnar
https://discord.gg/ruggnar
